PLSID_ABORT_OPERATION.description:
Id: PLSID_ABORT_OPERATION
Shown in message box when the user presses the abort button.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_PATCHING.message:
파일을 업데이트하는 중...
시간이 좀 걸릴 수 있습니다
PLSID_PATCHING.description:
Id: PLSID_PATCHING
Shown while the patch is applying the change.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_ADMIN_ACCESS.message: 현재 시스템에 적절한 권한이 없습니다. 관리자로 로그온 한 뒤 다시 업데이트를 진행하십시오.
PLSID_ADMIN_ACCESS.description:
Id: PLSID_ADMIN_ACCESS
Shown if the user running this patch does not have the rights necessary to modify the files.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_DATA_CHECK.description:
Id: PLSID_DATA_CHECK
Shown while the patch is checking that the installer file is not damaged.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_UNMODIFIED.message: 게임 파일이 수정되지 않았습니다. 문제를 해결 한 뒤에 다시 업데이트를 적용할 수 있습니다.
PLSID_UNMODIFIED.description:
Id: PLSID_UNMODIFIED
Appended to various error messages if the error did not cause damage to the existing installation of the game.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_RETRY.description:
Id: PLSID_RETRY
Title of button which will retry the operation. Currently the only operation supporting this is the free space check.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_WELCOME.description:
Id: PLSID_WELCOME
Shown on the first page of the of the patch.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_CREATE_FAILED.description:
Id: PLSID_CREATE_FAILED
Shown when the patch was unable to create a file.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_OPEN_FAILED.description:
Id: PLSID_OPEN_FAILED
Shown when the patch was unable to open a file.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_READ_FAILED.description:
Id: PLSID_READ_FAILED
Shown when there was problem while reading from file.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_INST_CORRUPTED.message: 데이터 무결성 확인 실패. 업데이트가 손상되었거나, 불안전합니다.
PLSID_INST_CORRUPTED.description:
Id: PLSID_INST_CORRUPTED
Shown if the patch executable is damaged.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_WRITE_FAILED.message: 파일을 쓸 수 없습니다! 디스크 용량이 부족합니다.
PLSID_WRITE_FAILED.description:
Id: PLSID_WRITE_FAILED
Shown when there was problem while writing to file.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_MSGBOX_TITLE.description:
Id: PLSID_MSGBOX_TITLE
Used as title of various message boxes
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_RIGHTS_OR_AV.message: 이 게임 파일에 액세스할 수 있는 권한이 있는지 확인합니다. 안티 바이러스 솔루션(백신)이 있다면 업데이트를 하는 동안 일시 정지해주시기 바랍니다.
PLSID_RIGHTS_OR_AV.description:
Id: PLSID_RIGHTS_OR_AV
Shown on error screens which might be caused by insufficient rights of the user running the patch or by interference of some aggressive anti-virus program.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_WRONG_VERSION.message: 지원되지 않는 게임 버전입니다!  이 업데이트는 이 버전을 지원을 하지 않거나, 혹은 게임 파일이 손상되었습니다.
PLSID_WRONG_VERSION.description:
Id: PLSID_WRONG_VERSION
Shown if the version found by the patch contains at least one file whose version is not known to the patch.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_TITLE.description:
Id: PLSID_TITLE
Used in title of the main window in the following form "GAMENAME - Update VERSION" i.e. "Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Update 1.2.14"
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_CONTINUE_ANYWAY.description:
Id: PLSID_CONTINUE_ANYWAY
Title of button which allows the user to ignore warning message.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_FILE_ACCESS_ERROR.description:
Id: PLSID_FILE_ACCESS_ERROR
Shown when there was problem while moving or deleting file.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_CONTINUE.description:
Id: PLSID_CONTINUE
Title of button which continues to next step of the patching.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_GAME_UP_TO_DATE.description:
Id: PLSID_GAME_UP_TO_DATE
Shown if the patch determines that the game is already patched.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_ABORT.description:
Id: PLSID_ABORT
Title of button which aborts currently running operation.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_MORE_INFO.message: 이 문제에 대한 자세한 내용은 $LOGFILE$에 있는 로그를 이용할 수 있습니다.
PLSID_MORE_INFO.description:
Id: PLSID_MORE_INFO
Show on all relevant error screens.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_GAME_CORRUPTED.message: 게임이 손상된 상태입니다. 업데이트를 하기 전에 재설치를 해주시길 바랍니다.
PLSID_GAME_CORRUPTED.description:
Id: PLSID_GAME_CORRUPTED
Appended to various error messages if the error did likely cause damage to the existing installation of the game.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_NOT_FOUND.message: 게임을 찾을 수 없습니다! 제대로 설치되지 않았거나, 일부 중요한 파일이 누락되어 있을 수 있습니다. 게임이 설치되어있는 디렉토리(base.scs 파일이 포함되어 있어야 합니다)에 업데이트 파일을 복사하여 실행해보세요.
PLSID_NOT_FOUND.description:
Id: PLSID_NOT_FOUND
Shown if the patch can not find existing installation of the game.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_EXIT_OPERATION.description:
Id: PLSID_EXIT_OPERATION
Shown when user attempts to exit the first page of the patch.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_FREE_SPACE.message:
경고: 이 대상 디스크에 적어도 $SPACE$ MB 정도의 충분한 여유 공간이 필요합니다. 
계속 진행 하시겠습니까?
PLSID_FREE_SPACE.description:
Id: PLSID_FREE_SPACE
Shown if the patch thinks that there is a insufficient space on the disk containing the game installation.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_NO_STEAM.message: 게임의 스팀 버전이 업데이트를 지원하지 않습니다! 자동 업데이트를 사용하지 않는 한 스팀이 자동으로 게임을 업데이트합니다
PLSID_NO_STEAM.description:
Id: PLSID_NO_STEAM
Used as title of various message boxes
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_ANALYZE.description:
Id: PLSID_ANALYZE
Shown while the patch is checking the existing game files to determine if the patch can be applied.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_EXIT.description:
Id: PLSID_EXIT
Title of button which exits the patch.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_APP_RUNNING.message: 다른 게임의 업데이트가 이미 진행 중입니다
PLSID_APP_RUNNING.description:
Id: PLSID_APP_RUNNING
Shown of the patch is launched while the game or the patch itself is already running.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_INST_ABORTED.message: 유저 요청에 의해 업데이트가 중단되었습니다. 게임은 변경되지 않습니다
PLSID_INST_ABORTED.description:
Id: PLSID_INST_ABORTED
Shown after user aborts the patching operation by press of the Abort button.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_UPDATE_FINISHED.description:
Id: PLSID_UPDATE_FINISHED
Shown after the patch completes update of the game.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_LANG.description:
Id: PLSID_LANG
Name of the language, put your native language name here in your native language
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.

PLSID_INTERNAL_ERR.description:
Id: PLSID_INTERNAL_ERR
Indicates that the patch encountered a unexpected error.
Group: Texts used by the game patcher.
